body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, attorney. Louisville native. Married to Henrietta Prather Pope. Studied law under and practiced with Charles M. Thruston. Later practiced in partnership with J. G. Barrett. Elected to the Kentucky House of Representatives in 1845 and 1848. Elected to the Senate from 1850-1851. Head of the State Guard at Louisville with the rank Brigadier General. Commanded Louisville Home Guards that accompanied William T. Sherman on an expedition towards Muldraugh’s Hill in 1861.
